abstract: The fatality rate of esophageal carcinomas is high in developing countries, making effective treatment desirable. Traditional treatment has now entered into the platform, and treatments based on the detection of biomarkers increasingly become a trend. This review presents several biomarkers of esophageal cancer, including chemotherapy-related biomarkers and targeted drug-related biomarkers, and the correlation of these biomarkers with drug response.
title: Personalized medicine of esophageal cancer.
